title: Has PlayStation Finally Given Up on PSVR2? - Kinda Funny Games Daily 06.21.24
description:
Go to http://shadyrays.com and use code KF20 for $20 off each pair of polarized sunglasses.

Go to http://harrys.com/KINDAFUNNY for a $3 Trial Set.

Go listen to A Better Paradise today, and don't forget to follow it on your platform of choice to make sure you never miss an episode!

Tim and Roger talk about Sony cutting down costs on VR development, Beyond Good & Evil 2 seemingly isn’t dead, and a canceled Red Faction game.

Time Stamps:
00:00:00 - Start
00:03:36 - Housekeeping
 - Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
     - GAMESCAST - What wasn’t at Summer Game Fest?
     - The STREAM is our Elden Ring marathon
 - There is no Game Showdown today.
     - If you’re a Kinda Funny Member:
     - You can get today’s Gregway which is “Roger is making a video game”
           -   The Roper Report   -
00:07:06 - Report: Sony Cuts Investment in VR Development - Taylor Lyles @ IGN
00:26:13 - Beyond Good & Evil’s remaster includes a new mission connecting to the second game - Andy robinson @ VGC
00:31:50 - Embracer Studio Was Working on a Brand New Red Faction Game Before Layoffs - Wesley Yin-Poole @ IGN
00:37:54 - Xbox head implies Tango Gameworks closure may have been due to a change of leadership - Chris Scullion @ VGC
00:41:34 - CD Projekt congratulates From Soft after Shadow of The Erdtree becomes the best reviewed expansion ever - Wesley Yin-Poole @ IGN
00:49:44 - Wee News!
00:51:08 - SuperChats
00:53:36 - You‘re Wrong
